typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		gkParametrizacion as long,
		descDataMart as string,
		descNombrePaquete as string,
		descVistaCalculada as string,
		descResponsableVcOrigen as string,
		descEstadoConsulta as string,
		descResponsableParametrizacion as string,
		descConsulta as string,
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SouDimParametrizacion
source(output(
		gkEjePalanca as long,
		idEjePalanca as string,
		descEjePalanca as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DSSinkDimComponentes
SouDimParametrizacion sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkContextoHito as long,
		fkIndicador as integer,
		dtmFechaRegistroContexto as timestamp,
		dtmFechaUsar as timestamp,
		descSponsor as string,
		descCorreoSponsor as string,
		vlrPlanHito as decimal(30,10),
		descContextoMotivacion as string,
		descObjetivo as string,
		descImpacto as string,
		descInterdependencias as string,
		descRiesgosPrincipales as string,
		descMitigantesRiesgos as string,
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		descUsuarioCarga as string,
		dtmFechaModificacion as timestamp,
		descUsuarioModificacion as string,
		descEstadoContextoHito as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:[' '],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
